mapper.insert: insert into jdelivery (deliveryid, id, storeid, storeaddress, destiaddress, menuname, ordertime, run) select jdelivery_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{storeid}, (select address from jstore where storeid = #{storeid}), #{destiaddress}, #{menuname}, sysdate, 0 from dual
mapper.select: SELECT LAST_NUMBER FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME = 'JDELIVERY_SEQ'
mapper.update: UPDATE jdelivery SET run = CASE WHEN SYSDATE > ordertime + INTERVAL '30' MINUTE THEN 2 WHEN SYSDATE > ordertime + INTERVAL '10' MINUTE THEN 1 ELSE run END WHERE SYSDATE > ordertime + INTERVAL '10' MINUTE
mapper.select: SELECT j.*, j2.STORENAME FROM JDELIVERY j, JSTORE j2 WHERE j.STOREID = j2.STOREID AND j.ID = #{id}
